description: City name for those included in the 360 geo-experiment.
A variable indicating whether a given city was in the treatment group. This varies by city, but is fixed across all dates for a given city.
The number of app downloads recorded in a given city on a given date
An indicator variable for the treatment period: 0 for July 1 - 14; 1 for July 15 - Aug 1. This varies by date, but is fixed across all cities for a given date.
